name: Decrypt the Dungeon
description:
Our submission the Dungeon Crawler GameJam 2023 is a First Person Dungeon Crawler with puzzle mechanics! In this game, you will embark on a small adventure through a dungeon. Armed with only a lantern, you must explore the depths of the dungeon, solve puzzles to progress. The lantern serves as your primary tool, allowing you to light up your way, but also protecting you from the darkness. However, it might sometimes be wise to check out what the darkness hides. One could say it is the duality of light and darkness. 

So get ready to explore and test your wits.

We would appreciate it, if you would take the time to fill out this Google form and give us some feedback. https://forms.gle/d9XDcU8Q1e8bpCqS7

Game Features: 

  • Mind-bending puzzle adventure with a twist. 
  • Dark brooding atmosphere.
  • Interesting twist in the mechanic.

Controls: 

W A S DMoveQ ETurn left/right.MouseMove Crosshair/Look around.F Interact T Toggle Lantern
